com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers

Class SCUIAuthenticationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers.SCUIAuthenticationHelper

  • public class SCUIAuthenticationHelper
extends java.lang.Object

    SCUIAuthenticationHelper class is the class that authenticates the user given in the SCUIContext through the SCUIAuthenticationProvider. The helper maintains SCUIAuthenticationProvider per application and when the session is invalidated the SCUIAuthenticationProvider is removed.

    ISCUIAuthenticationProvider ISCUIPostAuthenticationProvider rasrinivasan

      • loadAuthenticationProvider

        public static ISCUIAuthenticationProvider loadAuthenticationProvider(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method loads authentication provider using web.xml context parameter. It allows ISCUIAuthenticationProvider to be set only once for an application. uiContext of the type SCUIContext ISCUIAuthenticationProvider

      • loadAuthenticationProvider

        public static ISCUIAuthenticationProvider loadAuthenticationProvider(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        This method loads authentication provider using web.xml context parameter. This method should be used while initializing provider using a init servlet where SCUIContext is not available. It allows ISCUIAuthenticationProvider to be set only once for an application. servletContext of the type javax.servlet.ServletContext ISCUIAuthenticationProvider

      • processAuthentication

        public static SCUISecurityResponse processAuthentication(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method validates secure cookies, calls authenticate, post-authenticate. If the authentication is successful the method sets secure cookie if needed. This method returns either a failed or a success security response. This method does not forwards or redirects the request/response. The caller should read security response and take care of that.

        This method internally calls #authenticate(SCUIContext) method.

        uiContext success or failed security response
